Others: The game is a Western Conference matchup between the Utah Jazz (0-2) and Sacramento Kings (0-2). The Jazz averaged 27.2 assists per game on 42.0 made field goals last season, while the Kings averaged 28.3 assists per game on 43.3 made field goals last season. The game is scheduled to be played at Salt Lake City on Tuesday, 9 p.m. EDT, and both teams have injury concerns with Johnny Juzang (Jazz) and Devin Carter (Kings) out or day-to-day due to injuries.
